borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Formal application for an extension of time to allow planning permission to be extended until 1st May 2021 in accordance with the Business and Planning Act 2020.  In respect to the Governments Extension of certain planning permissions guidance, Section 12,  provided is the following details on behalf of The Original Bedstead Company. This includes,1.	The planning permission to which the application relates   2017/00520/FUL 2.	The condition which set out the time limit for implementation Condition 1  3.	Any condition(s) or other agreements which relate to environmental mitigation or enhancement measure  N/A 4.	Whether the original permission was subject to an Environmental Impact Assessment and or a Habitats Regulation            Assessment, or screening for either type of assessment   N/A Original Description;Erection of a two storey glazed rear extension to the side of the back addition at ground floor and basement level; and installation of a residential entrance door to the front elevation at ground floor level.
